reviewText: If you grew up with Lionel Trains during the post-WWII era, you will find this DVD very nostalgic.
Great dvd for my toy train loving 3 & 6 yr olds!
My 7 yr old nephew loved it (and all train videos)
My kid loves trains, this video has entertained him for hours!

I originally checked Toy Train Christmas Memories out from my local library for my grandson who is 7 years old.  My grandson loves trains and he absolutely loves this DVD.  We watched it so many times  I decided to order it for him for Christmas.  As a result of this DVD purchase we also purchased an electric train for him for Christmas!
